topic.title: Insert Path (Ethernet RX to TX Framer) Features Overview

body.p: The Insert path connects the ingress FEGE SGMII port to the request GCC I/F (TX Framer) egress GCC Links. The Insert path processes the incoming Ethernet frames and sends the GCC PDU to a shared buffer storage prior to the bit synchronous HDLC processor. The HDLC line-encoded PDU is sent to the GCC I/F (TX OTU/ODU framer) as requested from the interface.

Firmware coordinates the unicast/multicast buffer management through block descriptors of the shared buffer, Empty, Descriptor, RD Queue and Freed FIFOs. Multicast from Group Number to GCC Link is 1:N where N maybe from 1 to 32. Block size is 512 bytes with a total of 640 blocks available.
